title: Single Subject (Secondary) Internship Seminar III
description: Third course in the series. Seminar topics include engaging and supporting all students in learning; creating and maintaining effective environments for student learning; understanding and organizing subject matter for student learning; planning instruction and learning experiences for all students; assessing student learning; and developing as a professional educator. Prerequisites: EDS 380A-B. ED78 Single Subject major only. EDS 379C must be taken as a corequisite.
